title: What advances will likely come in 2021 for the United States Armed Forces? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most of the really interesting stuff will be classified. Lasers, smarter missiles and better communications for the individual troop on the ground could see some advancements. I would suspect drones on land, under and on the sea and in the air will be the next major development. Cheaper to build a plane without a pilot or a boat without a crew. That way, you don’t have deal with informing a family about their loved one not coming home.

Most likely regardless of the election results, it is safe to say that you will see heavy advances in hyper sonic programs, anti-missile defenses, and naval integration, as well as Marines fielding new equipment designed for rapid deployment and long range naval strike.
